docs.snippet: Matt Dominguez hit a tying homer and Jose Altuve's fourth hit drove in the go-ahead run as the Houston Astros rallied in the eighth inning to beat the Texas Rangers 3-2 on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Matt Dominguez hit a tying homer and Jose Altuve's fourth hit drove in the go-ahead run as the Houston Astros rallied in the eighth inning to beat the Texas Rangers 3-2 on Sunday.

headline.main: Dominguez, Altuve Team Up, Lead Astros Over Texas

docs.snippet: Eric Decker, the Jets’ off-season acquisition via the Broncos and Cold Spring, Minn., comes to New York with a country-music-singing wife, a reality TV show and a three-sport past....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eric Decker, the Jets’ off-season acquisition via the Broncos and Cold Spring, Minn., comes to New York with a country-music-singing wife, a reality TV show and a three-sport past.
docs.abstract: Profile of Eric Decker, former Denver Broncos receiver who agreed to terms with New York Jets this off-season; Decker played college baseball in Minnesota, and was drafted in 2009 by Minnesota Twins.

headline.seo: Eric Decker’s N.F.L. Rise Began on the Ball Fields in Central Minnesota
headline.main: Jets’ Big-Time Receiver Nourished by Small-Town Roots

docs.snippet: At the U.S. Open, where thwacks echo across eras, the grounds are in classic New York dig-we-must mode in preparation for a retractable roof in two years....
docs.lead_paragraph: At the U.S. Open, where thwacks echo across eras, the grounds are in classic New York dig-we-must mode in preparation for a retractable roof in two years.
docs.abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column; transformation of the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center, home of the United States Open, has begun with pilings in preparation for retractable roof over Aurthur Ashe Stadium in place.

headline.main: With Memories Entrenched, Hallowed Site of U.S. Open Plows Forward
headline.print_headline: With Memories Entrenched, a Hallowed Site Plows Forward

keywords.value: Billie Jean King National Tennis Center

docs.snippet: Prognosticators of doom for the N.F.L. say the league is getting too greedy, particularly in the expansion of its television package....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prognosticators of doom for the N.F.L. say the league is getting too greedy, particularly in the expansion of its television package.
docs.abstract: Ken Belson On Pro Football column explores whether the NFL is risking over-saturation by airing games on too many nights each week.

headline.main: The N.F.L.’s Cultural Juggernaut May Risk Market Saturation
headline.print_headline: A Cultural Juggernaut May Risk Market Saturation

docs.snippet: The halfway mark of a presidential cycle has often meant a rally on Wall Street, but investors shouldn’t count on it....
docs.lead_paragraph: The halfway mark of a presidential cycle has often meant a rally on Wall Street, but investors shouldn’t count on it.
docs.abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column says investors should not count on Wall Street rally that often comes during midterm election season; past performance never guarantees future returns and virtually no experts recommend using historical market patterns as templates for investing strategies.

headline.main: Midterm Election Mind-Reading: The Market Tends to Win
headline.print_headline: Midterm Mind-Reading: The Market Tends to Win
